Class Hippo

  • java.lang.Object
    • Hippo

  • public class Hippo
extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Hippo(int xLocation, int yLocation, java.awt.Color aColor)
      Constructor to create a new hippo at given x location, given y location, and of given colour.

      • Hippo

        public Hippo(int xLocation,
     int yLocation,
     java.awt.Color aColor)
        Constructor to create a new hippo at given x location, given y location, and of given colour.
        Parameters:
        xLocation - specifies the x location at which the hippo object will be created
        yLocation - specifies the y location at which the hippo object will be created
        aColor - specifies the colour that the hippo object will be
